text: læa h̄āk kl̀āw cêā ca dị̂ h̄ĕn k̄hṇa thī̀ phwk k̄heā t̄hūk h̄ı̂ yụ̄n xyū̀ beụ̄̂xngh̄n̂ā phracêā k̄hxng phwk k̄heā doythī̀ phraxngkh̒ dị̂ thrng kl̀āw ẁā nī̀ michı̀ khwām cring dxk h̄rụ̄x? Phwk k̄heā txb ẁā chı̀ k̄hxrạb phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ k̄hx s̄ābān d̂wy phracêā k̄hxng phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ phraxngkh̒ trạs̄ ẁā phwk ĉā cng lîm rs̄ kār lngthos̄ʹ kạn t̄heid neụ̄̀xngcāk kār thī̀ phwk cêā pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā
